Articles.Content:
Is there still such a thing as 6.4x and/or 10x stock size solar system for KSP? I've been away from the game for quite some time now and I usually play in RSS/RO. I wanted to experience the stock game again, but the stock size solar system is too small, easy and awkward to play in after playing RSS/RO for such a long time.

Thanks!

Kopernicus is still pending an update, but when that releases or if you're playing on 1.7.3, this is accomplished by Sigma Dimensions. Sigma88 appears to have shuttered their forum account, but a 1.7.3 release of Dimensions has in fact been posted to Github

https://github.com/Sigma88/Sigma-Dimensions
as @SingABrightSong said, you can keep an eye out for Kopernicus, when Kopernicus will update the SigmaDimensions release should follow pretty quickly
